title: Critérium du Dauphiné Stage 3: Derek Gee Dazzles with First WorldTour win, Nabs Race Lead
content:
Canadian star scores biggest win of career after a swath of near-misses, Roglič finishes with the favorites after early crash.

Read the full article at Critérium du Dauphiné Stage 3: Derek Gee Dazzles with First WorldTour win, Nabs Race Lead on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
